ygData.subject: Level 26
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you all for the exhalent equipment ideas last week I went from 24th to 26th in 2 days fighting in High Keep. Now I have more questions. 1. In HK on my
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you all for the exhalent equipment ideas last week I went from 24th to
26th in 2 days fighting in High Keep.
Now I have more questions.
1. In HK on my server (Rathe) there are usually 3 groups, one lookout room
group who pull lookout room,stairs and corner and 2 pit groups who pull from
ramp,raider and warrior room at once. My question is...Since we are not in
the rooms is it safe to use all instrument attack in the area outside the
lookout room?
2. Something is defiantly going on with chains..I was trying to
chain/fear...it was all I could do to keep chains up.

Pinen,
26th Bard of the NwN
Rathe Shard


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
